name: Santa Chaos
description:
"Santa Chaos" is a Christmas-themed game with a physics based sleigh.

Play as Santa on his nitro-powered steampunk sleigh and grab the coins to deliver presents to the kids before the time expires!

Avoid the Grinch coins and be aware of the obstacles!

All the sounds and musics are made from scratch by Music Composition students!

Also check the in game Extra-content we made for you!

We hope you'll enjoy our game and your holidays :)

Check our site for more: sound-scuolacomics.com
